function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air purification and ventilation may lead to the transmission of airborne infectious diseases within buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and potential outbreaks within indoor environments.","Mitigation":"Implementation of high-efficiency air filtration systems and increased ventilation rates to reduce airborne pathogen concentration.","Technologies":"HEPA filtration systems, increased air change rates, and natural ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff within indoor environments.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, property managers, and building owners."}]}
